name: Nozomi's Late Night Snack🐾
description:
Nozomi's Late Night Snack🐾

Nozomi's Late Night Snack is a short (5-10min) adventure game made by 2 people in 2 weeks. It is actually our first game ever made with very little experience with 3D modelling and Godot, but we are happy with how it turned out! We planned a bigger game, but time was not on our side, so we had to cut a lot of ideas and we just did the bare bone that we planned from the start. 

Story You are Nozomi. A stray kitten taken in by a university student named Hayami. One night you wake up to the sound of a picture frame falling over and a big hunger in your stomach. With your owner nowhere to be found you decide to go on an adventure for food through moonlight filled streets of Fukuoka, Japan. Features
  • Short story featuring cutscenes
  • 2D pixel art in a 3D World
  • Controller support
  • Original Soundtrack
Controls
  • ⬅️➡️ - Move Left/Right🐈 (Can also use A/D)
  • E - Interact/Meow🐱 (Can also use X on Keyboard and X/◾ on controller)
  • SHIFT - Run🐾 (Can also use Y on Keyboard and A/✖ on controller)
Credits
  • totsu - Game Director, Development, Some Visuals, Story, Music
  • Samix. -  Music, Visuals, 3D Models, Story
  • Orsino - testing, moral support, feedback

made for the 💵 $100 Game Jam with the limitation of only having 2 buttons outside of movement and the theme being "Moon Light"

if there are issues with the HTML5 build, try downloading the game instead.

The game is meant to be played in one sitting so it does not feature any saving. We are very sorry if you encounter a crash and you lose any progress... The time constraint got us real good and we had almost no time to playtest the game.

Things we plan to make/add/fix in an update after the gamejam concludes:

  • Settings Menu
  • Bug Fixes
  • Mobile Port
  • Better Sound Design
  • Expand the game! 🐾
